forum.content:
Hey guys, My name is Joey. I'm currently studying in National Chung Hsing University ( NCHU), Master of Business Administration(MBA) student. I'm looking for someone who wanna do Language Exchange with me :D

* I'm a road-running lover and bodybuilding also.
* Engage in Uber Intern.
* Having lots of interesting in E-commerce and Marketing field.
* Pay much more attention on " Entrepreneur "

Feel free to contact me :)

Thanks a lot ~
